entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 8:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
